main event: Multiple unidentified objects were observed visually and on radar over Yaak, Montana in 1952.
interesting points: The objects were observed to change colors, change shapes, and move in an erratic pattern.
The objects left a long white vapor trail when they disappeared.
One white light was observed behaving like a cigarette and several smaller objects were seen separating from a larger circular object estimated to be 30-50 feet in diameter.
The objects were observed over the course of an hour, from around 10:55 PM to 11:55 PM on September 6, 1952.
The objects were tracked on radar and also observed visually by several trained airmen who were familiar with conventional aircraft.
